pullrequest.title: Include the example directory in the directories checked by the checker.

content.raw:
I get the following console message:
~~~
cppcheck: Couldn't open the file: "/tmp/cpp_check.suppress".
~~~
This should fix it:
~~~
diff -r 0340a9c0b982 tools/code_check.sh
--- a/tools/code_check.sh	Thu Mar 12 14:34:09 2015 -0700
+++ b/tools/code_check.sh	Tue Mar 17 11:34:44 2015 -0700
@@ -57,6 +57,7 @@
 fi
 
 SUPPRESS=/tmp/cpp_check.suppress
+touch $SUPPRESS
 # The follow suppression is useful when checking for missing includes.
 # It's disable for now because checking for missing includes is very
 # time consuming. See CPPCHECK_CMD3.
~~~
content.html:
I get the following console message:

cppcheck: Couldn't open the file: "/tmp/cpp_check.suppress".

This should fix it:

diff -r 0340a9c0b982 tools/code_check.sh
--- a/tools/code_check.sh   Thu Mar 12 14:34:09 2015 -0700
+++ b/tools/code_check.sh   Tue Mar 17 11:34:44 2015 -0700
@@ -57,6 +57,7 @@
 fi

 SUPPRESS=/tmp/cpp_check.suppress
+touch $SUPPRESS
 # The follow suppression is useful when checking for missing includes.
 # It's disable for now because checking for missing includes is very
 # time consuming. See CPPCHECK_CMD3.
